meanings.definition: The attitude of opposing the construction of something perceived as undesirable in one's own neighborhood.
meanings.sent1: The nimbyness of the residents led to the cancellation of the new highway project.
meanings.sent2: Her nimbyness towards the proposed landfill site was well-known in the community.
meanings.sent3: The nimbyness of the neighbors reached new heights when they protested against the noisy playground.
meanings.sent4: The nimbyness in the town was like a shield protecting their peaceful streets.
meanings.sent5: The nimbyness of the locals was as strong as a brick wall, blocking any unwanted changes.

meanings.definition: The act of expressing opposition to a development or project in one's community.
meanings.sent1: After much nimbyness, the construction of the new shopping mall was halted.
meanings.sent2: The nimbyness of the group delayed the building of the new school.
meanings.sent3: Their nimbyness was evident when they organized a protest against the new factory.
meanings.sent4: The nimbyness of the residents was a barrier to progress in the town.
meanings.sent5: The nimbyness of the community was like a loud alarm, warning against unwanted changes.
